body_html: Sorry about the nn binding documentation. Yeah it could need some work. However, it really is just a way to link THNN to ATen, and you shouldn't be working with it on adding new features. The preferred way to add new features is via (1) ATen native function if the function should be in core and (2) c++ extension if you just want it yourself. Both ways are well documented.

body: Sorry about the nn binding documentation. Yeah it could need some work. However, it really is just a way to link THNN to ATen, and you shouldn't be working with it on adding new features. The preferred way to add new features is via (1) ATen native function if the function should be in core and (2) c++ extension if you just want it yourself. Both ways are well documented.
